text: Laos competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Laos entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Santisouk Inthavong |align=left|50 m freestyle |25.79 |109 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m backstroke |30.75 |67 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Slava Sihanouvong |align=left|50 m breaststroke |32.11 |64 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |30.40 |88 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Siri Arun Budcharern |align=left|50 m freestyle |31.32 |88 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m breaststroke |40.72 |48 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Laos at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Laotian sport
title: Laos at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
